power.title: Dire Wolverine Strike
power.fluff: You slash your enemies to pieces with the ferocity of a wounded dire wolverine

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons.

section.name: Attack:
section.target: each enemy in the burst you can see
section.text: Dexterity (main) vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (main) + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Dexterity modifier + your off-hand weapon's enhancement bonus damage.

power.title: Enclose the Prey
power.fluff: You and your beast companion circles your quarry, gaining a better position just before you strike

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Both you and your beast companion can shift up to 2 squares.

section.name: Cat, Raptor, or Serpent:
section.text: Your companion can shift a number of squares up to 1 + its Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Attack:
section.target: one creature designated as your quarry and threatened by your beast companion
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Spider or Wolf:
section.text: The attack deals additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Damage equal to the beast's [Strength or Dexterity] modifier + the beast's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Evasive Strike
power.fluff: You confound enemies by weaving through the battlefield unscathed as you make your attacks

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can shift a number of squares up to 1 + your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Attack
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If you did not shift the full distance before, you can shift the remaining squares.

power.title: Feral Ambush
power.fluff: Your beast lunges at a foe when it is distracted

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Beast vs. AC

section.name: Cat, Raptor, Serpent, or Wolf:
section.text: The beast can make the attack against Reflex instead

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[B] + beast's [Strength or Dexterity] modifier damage.
If the beast is flanking the target, it deals additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If the beast is flanking the target with you, damage equal to beast's [Strength or Dexterity] modifier + the beasts enhancement bonus.

power.title: Ferocious Insight
power.fluff: Your companion exudes an air of ferocity as it attacks, which allows both of you to read your foe's movements

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Beast vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[B] + beast's [Strength or Dexterity] modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can use the following action once before the end of your next turn:

section.name: Immediate Reaction:
section.text: Trigger: The target willingly moves; Both you and your beast companion can shift up to 2 squares, or up to 4 squares if you and your beast companion were flanking the target when you made the attack.

power.title: Fox's Cunning
power.fluff: Using the momentum from your enemy's blow to reposition, you make a sudden retaliatory attack as it stumbles to regain its composure

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An enemy makes a melee attack against you

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You can shift 1 square, and then make a basic attack against the triggering enemy.

power.title: Hindering Shot
power.fluff: An arrow to the knee slows even the hardiest creature

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is slowed and cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Hunter's Pounce
power.fluff: You leap forward and strike with a single, well-aimed blow that leaves your enemy reeling

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to 3 squares.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Hunting-Partner Strike
power.fluff: Working with an ally or your beast companion allows for that extra edge

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity (weapon) vs. AC, or
Beast vs. AC

section.name: Cat, Raptor, Serpent, or Wolf:
section.text: The beast can make the attack against Reflex instead

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, or 2[B] + beast's [Strength or Dexterity] modifier damage.
If you are flanking the target, your attack deals additional damage equal to your Strength modifier.
If the beast is flanking the target, the beast's attack deals additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you are flanking the target, damage equal to your Strength modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.
If the beast is flanking the target with you, damage equal to beast's [Strength or Dexterity] modifier + the beasts enhancement bonus.

power.title: Hurling Charge
power.fluff: You hurl one of your weapons and then launch into a charge

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding both a thrown weapon and another melee weapon

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Before the attack, you can use your hunter's quarry to designate the target as your quarry.

section.name: Thrown Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC (thrown weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: Strength modifier + your thrown weapon's enhancement bonus damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You charge the target.
If the thrown attack hit, your movement during the charge does not trigger attacks from the target.

power.title: Off-Hand Strike
power.fluff: A weapon in your off-hand allows for a quick recovery after a failure

section.name: Requirement:
section.text: You must be wielding two melee weapons, and have missed all targets with an attack during your current turn.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (off-hand) + Dexterity modifier damage.

power.title: Plant to the Hilt
power.fluff: You trap your foe with both weapons and use them as grips to swing the foe around to a new position

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC (main weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (main) damage, and you slide the target 1 square to a space within your reach.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (off-hand) damage, and you slide the target 1 square.
If the primary attack was a hit, you can slide the target up to 3 squares instead.

power.title: Power Strike
power.fluff: By pushing yourself beyond your limits, you unleash your full wrath against a foe

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You hit an enemy with a melee basic attack or a Ranger at-will attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The triggering attack deals +1[W] damage.

power.title: Precise Assault
power.fluff: You see an opening in an enemy's defenses, and break off your current attack to take advantage of the weakness

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed and at least 1 square. You do not provoke reactive strikes for leaving the first square, and have a +2 bonus to all defenses against attacks triggered by this movement.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC
If you were adjacent to a different enemy at the start of your current turn, you gain a +4 bonus to the attack roll

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you were adjacent to a different enemy at the start of your current turn, you deal damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Rapid Volley
power.fluff: With amazing speed, you unleash a volley of arrows at your enemies

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC
If you target only one creature, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, or 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage if you only targeted one creature.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If you only targeted one creature, you deal damage equal to your Dexterity modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Singular Shot
power.fluff: You single out a foe for a deadly attack

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
If no creature is adjacent to the target, you deal additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: If no creature is adjacent to the target, you deal damage equal to your Wisdom modifier + your weapon's enhancement bonus.

power.title: Skirmish Shot
power.fluff: You rush across the battlefield and then let off a devastating shot

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You move up to your speed. You have a +4 bonus to all defenses against reactive strikes triggered by this movement.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
If your movement triggered an attack from the target, you deal additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

power.title: Synchronized Assault
power.fluff: You command your beast companion to tear into your opponent, opening a gap for you to exploit

section.name: Effect (Raptor):
section.text: The beast can move up to its speed.

section.name: Beast Attack:
section.text: Beast vs. AC

section.name: Bear or Boar:
section.text: The beast can make the attack against Fortitude instead

section.name: Snake or Spider:
section.text: The beast can make the attack against Reflex instead

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[B] + beast's [Strength or Dexterity] modifier damage.

section.name: Cat or Wolf:
section.text: If the beast has combat advantage against the target, the attack deals additional damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make the Follow-up Attack.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.

power.title: Two-Fanged Strike
power.fluff: You sink two arrows or both of your weapons into your enemy, eliciting a howl of pain

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You make either the Melee Fang Strike, or the Ranged Fang Strike.

section.name: Primary Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC (main weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (main) + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Secondary Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC (off-hand weapon)

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] (off-hand) + Dexterity modifier damage.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Dexterity vs. AC
Make the attack twice against the same target; if you use a thrown weapon, you must use different ones for each attack

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1[W] + Dexterity modifier damage.
